KeyspaceTest For the tests we assume the following structure: <Keyspaces> <Keyspace Name="Keyspace1"> <ColumnFamily CompareWith="BytesType" Name="Standard1" FlushPeriodInMinutes="60"/> <ColumnFamily CompareWith="UTF8Type" Name="Standard2"/> <ColumnFamily CompareWith="TimeUUIDType" Name="StandardByUUID1"/> <ColumnFamily ColumnType="Super" CompareWith="UTF8Type" CompareSubcolumnsWith="UTF8Type" Name="Super1"/>
